thread.section_title: Deposit a Gift Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Deposit a Gift | depositagift.com
thread.title: Paul
thread.title_full: Deposit a Gift reviewed by Paul

author: Paul
title: Paul
text: Everything was great. Only issue was with login security problem. I was given assurance that everything was secure but there were clearly functionality issues with the site that compromised my account info. The picture limitations are a minor issue. Like the overall service but would hesitate on a big project given the security.
